items.value: The garrison is producing another army unit.
%113% distracted the soldiers with liquor so they ended up forgetting that they were supposed to form a new defensive army unit.
%113% stopped %01@ from training a new army unit.
%113% failed to distract the soldiers. A new %111% %112% unit has been formed at the garrison.
%113% has not returned. We can only assume the worst.
We decided not to intervene. The garrison ended up forming a new %111% %112% unit.
